original_text: And the people, the leaders of Gilead, said one to another, “Who is the man who will begin to fight against the Ammonites? He shall be head over all the inhabitants of Gilead.”
korean_text: 길르앗 백성과 방백들이 서로 이르되 누가 먼저 나가서 암몬 자손과 싸움을 시작하랴 그가 길르앗 모든 주민의 머리가 되리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: And the people, the leaders of Gilead,
who will begin to fight against the Ammonites?
He shall be head over all the inhabitants of Gilead.”
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 길르앗 모든 주민의 우두머리가 되리라.’
